name: horizon ranking
desc: Adjust individual horizon priorities and rankings.

properties.name: Horizon Rankings
properties.desc: The Horizon Rankings control allows the user to control individual surface priorities and rankings.

properties.name: Top To Bottom
properties.desc: The Top to Bottom button returns the rankings to their default values (1 on top).

properties.name: Bottom To Top
properties.desc: The Bottom to Top button reverses the ranking and is equivalent to reversed hierarchy.
